title: Noah Cyrus and Diablo ‘confirm relationship’ hours after DJ claims he’s single
text:
Noah and Diablo appear to have made things official (Pictures: Instagram/Getty)

Noah Cyrus and Diablo have confirmed their relationship, taking to social media to share some snaps of themselves sharing a smooch.

Ah, young love.

The DJ shared the cosy photos with his new beau at Bootsy Bellows in Los Angeles, writing: ‘I got a new arm tattoo.’

The photobooth pictures show Noah flipping off the camera, Diablo wrapping his arm around her, and the pair sharing a sweet kiss.

The 23-year-old DJ is best known for his collabs with the likes of David Guetta and Kodak Black, while Miley Cyrus’ 19-year-old sister is also a musician in her own right.

The new couple look smitten (Picture: diablo/instagram)

Fans are a bit baffled by the pairing for a few reasons.

Earlier in the day, just hours before he shared the snaps with Noah, Diablo took to social media to tell fans: ‘Guess I’m single!!’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Diablo and Lil Xan are also friends, which fans are finding a bit odd since the rapper dated Noah during 2018.

Meanwhile, the teen has been getting close to Tana Mongeau, with some shipping the pair, despite the YouTuber being married to Jake Paul.

Earlier this year, Noah, who recently spoke up for Mental Health Week, welcomed Diablo home after he posted a worrying message online about not being able to take the pressure of the industry anymore.

The star shared a video of himself sat surrounded by what appeared to be policemen and told his followers that they were about to ‘take him away.’

He claimed he was single earlier in the day (Picture: Instagram/diablo)

However, the musician – real name Sebastian Baldeon – returned home and was supported by Noah.

In her Instagram story, the singer uploaded a video of herself and Diablo singing Lady Gaga’s Shallow while sat in a car.

In the caption, the teenager wrote: ‘So happy you’re home,’ followed by, ‘I love you so f****** much.’

Noah previously dated Lil Xan (Picture: WireImage)

Since, Diablo appears to have bounced back, recently sharing a clip of a new track.

‘Me and @craigxen put in a lot of emotion into this song, we hope it inspires everyone,’ he wrote. ‘We are everything they said we couldn’t be.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘We have face tattoos, we make weird music, and we are successful. From being isolated to creating our own world.

‘Remember to stay positive and make the whole f***ing world fall in love with you.’

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

MORE: Noah Cyrus welcomes Diablo home after he was ‘taken away’ following worrying message
description: Noah Cyrus and Diablo confirm relationship after DJ claims he's single and after Miley Cyrus' sister split from Lil Xan.
